iati-activity.title: Rural The Big Dig Appeal
iati-activity.description: To improve health and livelihoods of rural poor in Malawi through increased access to safe water, sanitation and hygiene interventions thereby contributing to the achievement of MDGs.

Wildlife and Envoronmental Socisty of Malawi
